changePasswordDescription: Change your password regularly to keep it unique and secure.
setWithdrawalPINDescription: Set your Withdrawal PIN to protect your outgoing funds today.
phoneNumberVerificationDescription: Ensure your phone number is valid and accessible by you.
basicVerificationDescription: Confirm your identity by providing your full name and date of birth.
addressVerificationDescription: Secure your account by entering your residential address.
idVerificationDescription: Upload a valid identity document for full verification and access to advanced features.
verificationNotice: To serve you better, we require original identification documents. This helps secure your account for recovery and ensures that any gifts or rewards are sent to the correct location.
nicknameIsRequired: Nickname is required and must be between 6 and 16 characters long.
emailVerificationDescription: Verify your email address and keep your account safe. Ensure your email address is valid and accessible by you.
phoneVerificationDescription: Enter your phone number below to receive a verification code.
verificationCodeDescription: Please enter the 6-digit verification code sent to
updatePasswordDescription: Update your password to keep your account secure.
incorrectPIN: Incorrect PIN. Please enter the correct PIN.
newPasswordDescription: At least 6 characters with a capital letter and a number.
confirmNewPasswordDescription: Confirm your new password to keep your account secure.
passwordUpdatedDescription:
Your new password has been set.
You can now use it to securely log in.
passwordDoNotMatch: Password do not match. Please ensure both fields are identical.
newPasswordSameAsCurrent: New password cannot be the same as the current password.
